data.message: How can verify my Facebook account & my Facebook official page?

replies.message: Hey RA. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2wTWuMc. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. Information for this badge can be found in the Help Center here: http://bit.ly/2wj3cfg. -Tenaya

how can verify my Facebook official page?
